short_summary: NEED FOR DELL MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Information

* **Contract Title (English/French):** NEW Contract for Dell Maintenance – 2023-2024 (Nouveau contrat pour Dell Maintenance 2023-2024)
* **Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023291:T
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM019168/23291
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-27, 02:00:00 PM (UTC-5)
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
* **End User:** Shared Services Canada
* **End User Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

## Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Infrastructure (SRVTGD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Trade Agreements:** Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

## Tender Requirements

* **Tender for:** Dell Maintenance and Support Services
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Attachment:** Available at the following URLs:
	+ English: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/F5FC37C9-3461-464E-9B3D-7E2CDDFD4C50, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/897FBB8A-49A2-419F-B21E-2F4E53D4D3A2, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/BFEC1561-D663-4057-9E9F-5F2CF5B60546
